name: Time DashKing
description:
Controls: 

  • Left Click- Dash
  • Right Click- Ax Throw
  • W, A, S, D- Move

Summary:

You are DashKing, a Viking venturing into the dungeons to find and rescue an alluring Hot Viking Woman! Find your way through the dungeon by throwing your ax and dashing into your enemies to kill them. Be sure to fend off these deadly creatures to delay the constant countdown! If the countdown reaches 0, you will die an unfortunate death...

Resources:

all assets were made during the jam

tools used: Unity, Pixelart Studio, Photoshop, Bosca Ceoil, sfxr, Audacity

Credits:

Tryston Minsquero: Programmer and Project Manager

Michael Bettes: Game and Level Design

Aparna Manoj: Character Art, Prop Art, and Character Animation

Pauline Le: Tile Design, UI Art, and Sound Effects

Kameron Thrasher: Game Soundtrack

Made for Ludum Dare 50: Delay the inevitable
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/time-dashking
